SummaryEnglish:
The story of Saint Tail follows a simple formula: school girl Meimi Haneoka transforms into the mysterious thief Saint Tail, and steals back what was stolen or taken dishonestly. She's assisted by a classmate and sister-in-training, Seira Mimori, whose position in the church after school each day allows her to hear the troubles of those who have been wronged and have come to pray to God.

While Saint Tail steals to right the wrongs done to innocent people, she's a thief to the police force. Her classmate Daiki Asuka Jr., called Asuka Jr., and son of Detective Asuka, is hot on her trail. Saint Tail delivers notices of her planned capers to Asuka Jr., to give him a fair chance to catch her.

1.TitleEnglish: The Cutest Little Thief! She Will Steal Your Heart!
1.SummaryEnglish: A string of thefts convinces Asuka Jr. that Saint Tail is behind them.

2.SummaryEnglish: A notice by Saint Tail to Asuka Jr. starts rumors of the two working together.

3.SummaryEnglish: Meimi plans to buy a hedgehog pet, only to have it purchased by someone with a devious plot for the animal.

4.SummaryEnglish: To stop a forced wedding, Saint Tail must steal a wedding veil.

5.TitleEnglish: Legend of Happiness?! The Clock Tower Commotion

6.TitleEnglish: New Student Rina. A Formidable Enemy
6.SummaryEnglish: A new rival appears. Rina joins Asuka Jr. on his pursuit of Saint Tail.

7.SummaryEnglish: After Asuka Jr. receives a theft notice from Saint Tail, Rina takes over operations to capture her.

8.SummaryEnglish: Rina finds baseball tickets dropped by Saint Tail, and Meimi searches for lost baseball tickets. Rina wonders if Meimi could be Saint Tail, and plans to find out.

9.SummaryEnglish: A wedding dress design is stolen. Saint Tail plans to take back the design during the wedding dress contest.

10.SummaryEnglish: Rina and Asuka Jr. make a deal: If Meimi is Saint Tail, Asuka Jr. must be Rina's boyfriend. If not, Rina will stop following Meimi around.

11.TitleEnglish: The Big Scoop! An Uproar at the School Festival
11.SummaryEnglish: Sawatari from the school newspaper takes a photo to use out of context. Saint Tail plans to retrieve the film before it can be developed.

12.TitleEnglish: Surprise! The Large Lizard Santa Claus?!
12.SummaryEnglish: A lost pet must be returned before its young owner moves away. An easy task for Saint Tail, until she learns the secret of Tama: it's a giant pet lizard, and Saint Tail is too afraid to steal it.

13.SummaryEnglish: A valuable mirror has been stolen and placed in an auction. Saint Tail intends to steal back this mirror which reflects ones true self.

14.TitleEnglish: The Platform of Love and Tears
14.SummaryEnglish: An American's bicycle has been stolen by a child. Asuka Jr. guards the boy's bike, awaiting Saint Tail's arrival.

15.TitleEnglish: Run After a Jewel Thief! Litte, the Naughty Dog
15.SummaryEnglish: A stuffed toy with a jewel hidden inside is accidentally sold, then taken by a homeless dog in the park. It's up to Saint Tail to retrieve the doll before the jewel thieves can complete their task.

16.SummaryEnglish: While Detective Asuka investigates a shady outfit, Saint Tail challenges to kidnap the Chinese Iron Chef.

17.TitleEnglish: The Heart Thief on St. Valentine's Day??
17.SummaryEnglish: A misunderstanding leads Asuka Jr. to believe Saint Tail is out to steal classmate T≈çru's heart, and right around Valentine's Day.

18.TitleEnglish: Danger, Do Not Touch! Super Electric Trap
18.SummaryEnglish: Rina asks Asuka Jr. to a concert before Meimi is able to. On the same night as the concert, Saint Tail's plans to steal a metal weathercock, which unknown to her is set to electrocute anyone who touches it.

19.TitleEnglish: A Comet Approaches! The Earth's Final Night??
19.SummaryEnglish: A young boy is moving, and this will be his only chance to see Graham's comet through a telescope, but he and his friends are turned away. Saint Tail plans to steal the comet for them.

20.TitleEnglish: Get Back the Phantom Bird Egg!
20.SummaryEnglish: Saint Tail must retrieve a stolen egg before its authenticity is checked.

21.SummaryEnglish: A memorable harmonica is stolen, and its owner cannot win the music competition without it.

22.TitleEnglish: The UFO Appears!? A Town in Panic
22.SummaryEnglish: A fake photo of a UFO means big business for a museum. It's up to Saint Tail to retrieve the fake photo before anyone is fooled by it.

23.TitleEnglish: Unforgivable! The Bad Guys Destroy a House
23.SummaryEnglish: A house is lost to a loan company, but all a young girl wants from it is her box of memories back. Saint Tail must recover the box before the house is torn down.

24.TitleEnglish: A Fake Calling card? The Secret of the Perfume Trap
24.SummaryEnglish: A fake notice from Saint Tail sends Asuka Jr. to a flower house where perfume is made. Saint Tail appears to set things right.

25.TitleEnglish: A Strong Foe! Confronting Elite Detective
25.SummaryEnglish: A master detective arrives to capture Saint Tail, which Saint Tail must retrieve a small statue for an ailing woman to see one last time.

26.TitleEnglish: Meimi is Engaged to a Multi-Millionaire's Son!?
26.SummaryEnglish: A rich young man encounters Meimi, and instantly falls in love. With the approval of Meimi's school, he courts her with plans of marriage.

27.SummaryEnglish: Proof of a popular idol girl's relationship is in the hands of a rival. She must give up an acting job or the locket will be show to the media, unless Saint Tail steals it first.

28.TitleEnglish: The Mayor's Ambition! Stealing a Swan (1)
28.SummaryEnglish: Rina tries to convince her uncle, the mayor, that Asuka Jr. has no plans on actually catching Saint Tail. The mayor gives Asuka Jr. one last chance: guard an expensive crystal swan sculpture on loan from another city.

29.TitleEnglish: The Mayor's Ambition! Stealing a Swan (2)
29.SummaryEnglish: Asuka Jr. follows after the stolen swan, only to find himself in the middle of a larger plot. When the two are locked in a room together, Asuka Jr. and Saint Tail must compromise to get the sculpture back before it's sold overseas.

30.TitleEnglish: Her True Character Revealed! Meimi's Critical Moment
30.SummaryEnglish: Sawatari takes a photo of Meimi playing with her hedgehog, Ruby, outside. Upon seeing the photo, Asuka Jr. recognizes the pet from an early encounter with Saint Tail, leading him to demand answers from Meimi.

31.TitleEnglish: Steal the Jewel of the Moon!
31.SummaryEnglish: A thief hopes to make amends for his past mistakes, but may return to a life of crime unless Saint Tail arrives first.

32.TitleEnglish: Steal a Woman's Marathon Running Shoes
32.SummaryEnglish: A marathon runner's efforts are being sabotaged. Her only chance to win is if Saint Tail steals back her stolen custom shoes.

33.TitleEnglish: A Swordswoman's Wish! To Seal the Excellent Sword
33.SummaryEnglish: A wonderful blade is won through cheating, and Meimi vows to steal it back. Saint Tail encounters another thief, Mouse, who's been stealing swords.

34.SummaryEnglish: A horse has been taken, and is on a train to leave town. Saint Tail must take back the horse while avoiding Asuka Jr. on the train.

35.SummaryEnglish: A gardener's only wish is to see a tree he healed be spared. With magic on her side, Saint Tail sets out to steal back the "Tree of Happiness".

36.TitleEnglish: A Precious Creature of Nature: Save the Beautiful Butterfly!
36.SummaryEnglish: Rare butterflies are illegally captured. After receiving a notice from Saint Tail, Asuka Jr. sets out to discover their hidden location before the thief arrives to take them.

37.TitleEnglish: Phantasmal Masterpiece! A Woman Detective is Back
37.SummaryEnglish: A detective returns to Japan to restore her family's honor, even if it means stealing. Saint Tail plans to find the painting to steal, herself.

38.TitleEnglish: A Burst of Laughter! The Detective Team Does a Great Job
38.SummaryEnglish: Classmates Kyoko and Ryoko form a detective team to capture Saint Tail before Asuka Jr. can. They enlist Meimi as a member, and expect her to show up at Saint Tail's next caper.

39.TitleEnglish: White Dolphin' - Return to the Sea!
39.SummaryEnglish: Meimi and Asuka Jr. spend time together at an aquarium, where they encounter a white dolphin meant to be free.

40.TitleEnglish: Mom's Secret! A Female Thief's Vengeance
40.SummaryEnglish: The secret behind Meimi's mother's past is revealed. Meimi hopes to steal back a jewel to close the final chapter on her mother's past life of crime.

41.TitleEnglish: A Formidable Foe!? A Mischievous Pixie's Trap!
41.SummaryEnglish: A young fortune teller, Maju, uses her power to steal from her visitors. Saint Tail must retrieve the stolen statue, but if Asuka Jr. meets with Maju, Meimi's identity could be revealed.

42.SummaryEnglish: Rumors are going around that Saint Tail has been stealing countless items. Asuka Jr. holds faith in Saint Tail, but Meimi knows she must take action to clear her name quickly.

43.TitleEnglish: The Final Battle! Save Asuka Jr.
43.SummaryEnglish: Asuka Jr. has been missing, and Meimi fears he's been kidnapped. From his place of captivity, Asuka Jr. tries to fathom why Meimi hid her identity of Saint Tail. Meimi prepares to save Asuka Jr. at any cost.
